summary: The history, politics, pleasure, and BS of wine told through opening ten very different bottles.
cast: Silvia Altare|Brian Carmody|Ian Cauble|Jean-Louis Chave|Fred Dame|Aubert De Villaine|Laura Fiorvanti|April Fritz|Peter Gago|Jessica Goldapple|Yoon Ha|Geoff Kruth|Ted Lemon|Pax Mahle|Steve Matthiasson|Brian McClintic|Carole Meredith|Frédéric Panaiotis|Rajat Parr|Dlynn Proctor|Madeline Puckette|Sabato Sagaria|Jean Trimbach|Kelli White|Dustin Wilson
title: SOMM: Into the Bottle
